en_US.must_manager: I won't let you do this until you're TIL manager.
en_US.new_manager: Oh my god, you're my new TIL manager now :scream:
en_US.no_facts: I'm a dumb Treecko and don't know any interest facts :frowning:
en_US.invalid_id: Sorry, but I don't know a fact with that ID.
en_US.info_prefix: I already learned {} moves, and I want learn more facts from {}!
en_US.help_til_info: Show how many facts I have.
en_US.desc_til_info:
Show how many facts I have
If you are a TIL manager, admin or botmaster, all facts are shown in a DM.
en_US.desc_til_set:
Configures TIL.

Available options:
  allow_search [true|false] - Allows users who are not a mod, admin or TIL manager the usage of !til search
  redo_cooldown [integer] - sets the cooldown (in seconds) for the usage of the redo reaction
en_US.desc_til_search: Searches the facts for search terms and returns the best result that contains all terms.

de_DE.desc_til_info:
